name: Southern Baked Popcorn Chicken Dinner

ingredients.name: Southern Baked Gluten Free Crumb Mix

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Cut chicken into 2" pieces. Place in a bowl; coat with oil. Add mix; toss to evenly coat. Spread out on sheet pan. Bake until cooked through, 15–18 min.
Meanwhile, cut unpeeled potatoes into 2" pieces. Place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high 8 min or until tender.
Add seasoning; mash potatoes, then stir in milk and butter. If needed, cover and microwave on high, 1 min or until warm.
tips: Vegetarian option: swap chicken for 2 pkgs (350 g each) extra-firm tofu. Follow directions above and bake 10–15 min.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavours on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
